body.name: Gel Infused High Dense Memory Foam Seat Cushions for Office Chair, Car, Wheelchair-Coccyx Seat Cushion for Tailbone Pain Pressure Relief (Light Grey)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 4 mins
features: Enhanced Comfort: Experience the ultimate comfort with our gel-infused memory foam seat cushion. Its strategically designed coccyx cutout allows your tailbone to float, ensuring even those with sacrum sensitivities can sit for extended periods without discomfort. Say goodbye to back pain and enjoy luxurious seating wherever you go!

Breathable Mesh Cover: The cushion is covered in a breathable mesh material that promotes airflow, preventing sweat and heat build-up. The removable cover is also machine washable, making it easy to keep your seat cushion clean and fresh.

Ergonomic Design: With its carefully crafted ergonomic design, our seat cushion ensures optimal support and promotes healthy posture. It helps align your spine, reducing strain and allowing you to sit for longer periods without discomfort.

Premium quality materials: We use only the finest materials to create our gel seat cushion. The 30 percent higher amount of premium memory foam ensures durability and long-lasting support. You can rely on the cushion to maintain its shape and provide consistent comfort day after day.

Temperature-Sensitive Design: Designed with your comfort in mind, our gel seat cushion is sensitive to temperature fluctuations. In colder weather, some users have mentioned that the cushion may become firm and hard. However, once the material warms up, it quickly returns to its soft and supportive state.
body.description: The Pubemy Gel Infused Seat Cushion, a must-have for your office chair, wheelchair, or car seat. Experience optimal comfort and support during your workday with this premium cushion. Designed for versatility, it can be easily interchanged between different seats, whether it's a rolling executive chair or a traditional desk chair.The Pubemy Seat Cushion is perfect for both home and office use, ensuring that you can stay productive and comfortable wherever you are. The gel-infused technology provides a cooling sensation, reducing any discomfort caused by sitting for long periods.Crafted with your comfort in mind, this cushion helps alleviate pressure points and promotes proper posture. It's like sitting on a cloud! The high-quality materials used ensure durability, so you can enjoy the benefits of this cushion for years to come.Whether you're working on important projects, attending meetings, or simply relaxing, the Pubemy Seat Cushion will provide the support you need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm and good quality
reviews.reviewText: I like this cushion because it's firmness. I had to sit for hours doing research for school and I had to endure a lot of back pain. The firmness of Pubemy Gel Infused High Dense Memory Foam Seat Cushions for Office Chairs helps ease my back pain. I love it and would refer it to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Seat Cushion
reviews.reviewText: My office chair is very hard and sits very low, so I wanted a comfortable solution. I also wanted something neutral. This pillow is the perfect solution to my problem! I look forward to sitting on it every day. It also helps with low back pain. I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, one that works!
reviews.reviewText: They may look alike, but that's where it ends. Not just about chair pad.These are high quality material and truly a "soft-firm" in that they support but don't just compress to nothing like many others.Get these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars To danged short
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5,10” and 160lbs. I use this in a Toyota Sienna. The cushion does eliminate my pain on long drives.My main issue is that it is a bit small. Mainly, it’s too short from front to back. Every time I get in, I have to fiddle and adjust to get it in the right position. Ideally, IMO, it should be about 3” longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Took away the pain
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and find it difficult to focus at a desk which means I sit in an armchair and a couch for most of the day. I had so much back pain. When I first got this cushion, I used it at a desk, and the pain went away, but so did my focus, so I moved this to the couch, and it worked just as well!!! Back pain only returned when I stopped using it for a couple of weeks.This photo was taken after 5 months of use. It has absolutely kept its shape despite being used constantly. The quality is excellent, the product affordable, and I love the washable cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely cushy and comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: This pillow saved my tail bone! I can comfortably sit in my chair for hours now. I wish there was an extra large size as the base of my chair is large. There is a gap between the back support of my chair and where the pillow stops. I simply put another lumbar pillow in that gap to give me the back support I need. If you have a regular size chair it will work perfectly for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have bought many different seat cushions and I finally found the one. I can seat comfortably for longer periods of time and it stays in place because of the support in the bottom. I take it with me in the car as well. I am very pleased with my seat cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for work
reviews.reviewText: My work chair gets unforgiving after a while and I find this helped realign my back so that I’m less sore and not slouching at work. It’s held it’s shape well also and I haven’t noticed any degrading

As a student and a writer I spend a lot of time at my desk. As a senior citizen I have an arthritic spine with several bulging discs. I am in constant pain and will clutch at almost anything I think will help.This cushion offers some small improvement simply because it adds extra padding. However it is too small; it only covers about 2/3 of the surface of my chair seat.It is also very firm, which doesn't help the comfort level. A little bigger, a little softer, this rating might have been 5 stars.I expect that if your problem is associated strictly with the coccyx it would supply more relief due to the cutout in that area.
